title: The drunken man has sex with the snowman, loses the genitals to Frostbit.
subtitle: :: Fake news sites dumped a man in 2013 who lost his genitals because of frostbite after a sexual encounter with a snowman.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: An average alcoholic lost his penis because of frostbite after a drunken sexual encounter with an iceman.
